lines.text: Now you're really pissing me off, Sharon. Sharon!
Look, I know what you're going through, Sharon, really I do, it's hard to admit that Ann is gone, so it's like you're holding on to the hope, hope that she's still alive.
I thought you liked my playing.
I'm your friend, I have to be polite, don't I?
Don't be polite, please. Tell me what you really think.
That was a really stupid thing to do, Sharon!
'Cause I'm gonna throw you off the rope, Sharon, and I'm gonna tell them that you fell.
I was getting close to you. You were scared and you asked me for comfort and I liked that.
